H0.text: What is the pen name of the author who created the character Fu Manchu. Arthur Conan Doyle

H1.text: What is the pen name of the author who created the character Fu Manchu. Edgar Wallace

H2.text: What is the pen name of the author who created the character Fu Manchu. Agatha Christie

H3.text: What is the pen name of the author who created the character Fu Manchu. Sax Rohmer

A4.text: Arthur Henry 'Sarsfield' Ward was better known as Sax Rohmer
